generator.title: Generator
generator.description: Turn on and off the Generator
generator.tooltip: The Generator is the feature that generates faces. If you turn it off, you will not be able to generate faces.

content.on: Are you sure you want to turn off the Generator? You will not be able to generate faces.
content.off: Are you sure you want to turn on the Generator? You will be able to generate faces and use the Generator.
